tooltipls.reply: Notify email senders that their emails has been received.
tooltipls.createCase: Automatically create case from incoming emails
tooltipls.replyToAddress: Specify email address of this mailbox to make response come here.
tooltipls.caseDistribution: How cases will be assigned to. Assigned directly to the user or among the team.
tooltipls.assignToUser: User emails/cases will be assigned to
tooltipls.team: Team emails/cases will be related to

messages.couldNotConnectToImap: Could not connect to IMAP server
